title: League wont download on my PC?
body: Hi, today my laptop wont run because of faulty motherboard, so i resorted to my old gaming computer that has ok specs despite its age. So today I wanted to play league but whenever the download finishes on the browser( Google chrome) nothing happens when I click on the download. I'm on Windows Vista Home Premium OS, it's a 64-bit OS, with 8 GB of RAM. Processor is Intel(R) Core(TM) 2 Duo cpu 3.00 GHz

replies.body:
Heeeey those specs are still pretty good, you should have no problems running League as far as I can tell!

Hmmmmm that download not responding when it's done is a little concerning though. It might be that Windows is blocking the program from running because it doesn't recognize it as a safe download, so try going to your download page and opening the download from there. If it's still not working, we may need to update your [**permission settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to allow League to run.
